frontmatter.title: Blocktag - Last Mile in Authenticity
frontmatter.meta_description: Create security tags by yourself to tag and authenticate things, people, places
frontmatter.heading: Last Mile in Authenticity
frontmatter.description: Create security tags by yourself to tag and authenticate things, people, places

usecases.heading: Secure IOT
usecases.description:
Low cost printable security
for Internet Of Things (IOT)
Scan printed tag to read and write
data securely for any tagged
thing, person or place

usecases.heading: Supply Chain
usecases.description:
Integrate with barcode/QR tag systems
to prove supply chain's operator identity,
physical goods possession and
data trustworthiness

usecases.heading: Physical NFTs
usecases.description:
Create physical Non Fungible Token (NFTs)
by printing Blocktag tags on physical goods
and attaching tag's serial id to a blockchain

usecases.heading: Safe Metaverse
usecases.description:
Paste Blocktag tags at places
as secure markers or content links
for people to navigate Augmented Reality (AR) safely

features.heading: Integrable and Backwards Compatible
features.description: Minimize or eliminate downtime when integrating with your existing systems - but get all the additional features Blocktag offers.

features.heading: Cryptographic Assurances
features.description: Blockchain and encryption enables identity and timestamp verification that is tamperproof, leading to robust automation without requiring human trust. Optional and no changes necessary.

features.heading: Role Based Access Control
features.description: Each user, from employee to courier to consumer, has their own identity on the Blocktag system. Have control over what each user group can see, for just the right balance of privacy and proof.

features.heading: Provenance
features.description: Provenance can be tracked on the company or individual level depending on customizable permissions. Prove to your customers that what they are receiving was produced by you.

carousel.description: Indirect thermal transfer printing on textiles
Digital tag on screen without printing

consumerfeatures.heading: Backwards Compatible
consumerfeatures.description: All Blocktags that include a QR code are fully compatible with built in QR readers in Apple and Android phones.

consumerfeatures.heading: No Special Hardware Needed
consumerfeatures.description: Compatible with most cell phone cameras manufactured in the last 10 years.

consumerfeatures.heading: Durable Tags
consumerfeatures.description: Resistant to heat, pressure, and electromagnetic radiation, unlike active solutions such as RFID and NFC.

consumerfeatures.heading: Offline Authentication
consumerfeatures.description: Internet connection not required for incredible speed and ease of use. *for most tasks

consumerfeatures.heading: Remote Authentication
consumerfeatures.description: Prove presence and authenticity to someone on the other side of the world.

consumerfeatures.heading: Digital Wallet
consumerfeatures.description: Exclusive access to content and digital collectibles based on proof of presence.

enterprisefeatures.heading: Track and Trace
enterprisefeatures.description: Track how your products flow through the supply chain with real time updates on individual, parcel, or pallet level identifiers.

enterprisefeatures.heading: Analytics
enterprisefeatures.description: Get real time business intelligence data covering the your entire supply chain, and beyond. See disruptions and inefficiencies as soon as they occur.

enterprisefeatures.heading: Access
enterprisefeatures.description: Decrease the distance between your company and all the other touchpoints in your products' lifetime - from factory to consumer to secondary markets.

cta.heading: Enterprise Dashboard
cta.description: Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life One day however a small line of blind text
